channel.title: CIA on UFO History
channel.description: Recent content in CIA on UFO History

item.title: 1952 ATIC Meeting
item.description: CIA, ATIC, and representatives from either Project Stork or Battelle Memorial Institute (referenced indirectly in Pentacle Memo), held at ATIC.

item.title: Robertson Panel
item.description: 1953-January-14,15,16 Robertson Panel, Washington D.C. CIA-sponsored meeting of a scientific panel to consider the problem of “flying saucers”. The outcome of these meetings was a classified recommendation to make up stories and plausible explanations for the phenomenon to keep the public unaware of extra terrestrials and reduce the number of UFO reports coming in. It concluded that it should discount all reports from the public and rely on instrumentation from the military.
